definition: the four elements: earth, water, fire, and wind (Buddhism)/the four freedoms: speaking out freely, airing views fully, holding great debates, and writing big-character posters, 大鳴大放|大鸣大放[da4 ming2 da4 fang4], 大辯論|大辩论[da4 bian4 lun4], 大字報|大字报[da4 zi4 bao4] (PRC)
four/4
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
lit. the four elements are vanity (idiom)/this world is an illusion

the four great caves, namely: Longmen Grottoes 龍門石窟|龙门石窟[Long2 men2 Shi2 ku1] at Luoyang, Henan, Yungang Caves 雲岡石窟|云冈石窟[Yun2 gang1 Shi2 ku1] at Datong, Shanxi, Mogao Caves 莫高窟[Mo4 gao1 ku1] at Dunhuang, Gansu, and Mt Maiji Caves 麥積山石窟|麦积山石窟[Mai4 ji1 Shan1 Shi2 ku1] at Tianshui, Gansu
Four Great Yuan Dramatists, namely: Guan Hanqing 關漢卿|关汉卿[Guan1 Han4 qing1], Zheng Guangzu 鄭光祖|郑光祖[Zheng4 Guang1 zu3], Ma Zhiyuan 馬致遠|马致远[Ma3 Zhi4 yuan3] and Bai Pu 白樸|白朴[Bai2 Pu3]
the four masters of Yuan poetry, namely 虞集[Yu2 Ji2], 範梈|范梈[Fan4 Peng1], 楊載|杨载[Yang2 Zai4] and 揭傒斯[Jie1 Xi1 si1]
Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties, namely: Cao Buxing 曹不興|曹不兴[Cao2 Bu4 xing1], Gu Kaizhi 顧愷之|顾恺之[Gu4 Kai3 zhi1], Lu Tanwei 陸探微|陆探微[Lu4 Tan4 wei1] and Zhang Sengyou 張僧繇|张僧繇[Zhang1 Seng1 you2]

Four great compilations of Northern Song dynasty, namely: Extensive records of the Taiping era (978) 太平廣記|太平广记, Imperial readings of the Taiping era 太平御覽|太平御览, Prime tortoise of the record bureau 冊府元龜|册府元龟, Finest blossoms in the garden of literature 文苑英華|文苑英华
pinyin: Bei3 Song4 si4 da4 bu4 shu1

definition: Four Great Calligraphers of early Tang/refers to Yu Shinan 虞世南[Yu2 Shi4 nan2], Ouyang Xun 歐陽詢|欧阳询[Ou1 yang2 Xun2], Chu Suiliang 褚遂良[Chu3 Sui4 liang2] and Xue Ji 薛稷[Xue1 Ji4]
Four Sacred Mountains of Buddhism, namely: Mt Wutai 五臺山|五台山 in Shanxi, Mt Emei 峨眉山 in Sichuan, Mt Jiuhua 九華山|九华山 in Anhui, Mt Potala 普陀山 in Zhejiang
pinyin: Si4 da4 Fo2 jiao4 Ming2 shan1

definition: the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature, namely: A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4], Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], Water Margin 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
the four heavenly kings (Sanskrit vajra)/the four guardians or warrior attendants of Buddha
the four great Chinese inventions: paper, printing, magnetic compass and gunpowder
four great basin depressions of China, namely: Tarim 塔里木盆地 in south Xinjiang, Jungar 準葛爾盆地|准葛尔盆地 and Tsaidam or Qaidam 柴達木盆地|柴达木盆地 in north Xinjiang Sichuan 四川盆地
the four legendary beauties of ancient China, namely: Xishi 西施[Xi1 shi1], Wang Zhaojun 王昭君[Wang2 Zhao1 jun1], Diaochan 貂蟬|貂蝉[Diao1 Chan2] and Yang Yuhuan 楊玉環|杨玉环[Yang2 Yu4 huan2]
Four great beards of Beijing opera, namely: Ma Lianliang 馬連良|马连良, Tan Fuying 譚富英|谭富英, Yang Baosen 楊寶森|杨宝森, Xi Xiaobo 奚嘯伯|奚啸伯

Four great compilations of Northern Song dynasty, namely: Extensive records of the Taiping era (978) 太平廣記|太平广记, Imperial readings of the Taiping era 太平御覽|太平御览, Prime tortoise of the record bureau 冊府元龜|册府元龟, Finest blossoms in the garden of literature 文苑英華|文苑英华

sentences.english: The stone and grass thousands years love, four families with Chang.
sentences.chinese: 顽石幽草千年恋，四大家族衰与昌。

sentences.english: Fifty human years are equal to one day & night among the Devas of the Four Great Kings.
sentences.chinese: 人间五十年，是四大王天天神的一昼夜。

sentences.english: Mansions" is one of China's four famous book !"
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道“红楼梦”是中国的四大名著之一。

sentences.english: Mount Wutai in China as one of the four famous Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 五台山为我国四大佛教名山之一。

sentences.english: Winter bamboo shoots can be found in four major Chinese cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 在中国的四大菜系里，都能见到冬笋。

sentences.english: The examination paper is in four sections. Please attempt all sections.
sentences.chinese: 考试题目共分为四大题，请回答所有的大题。

sentences.english: Image above: Three of NASA's four Great Observatories are still in service. Credit: NASA
sentences.chinese: 四大观测器中，仍有三个在服役。

sentences.english: Jiaji Duck is one of the four famous Hainan dishes, which is popular with people in Qionghai.
sentences.chinese: 嘉积鸭是海南四大名菜之一，深受琼海人喜欢。

sentences.english: English and Chinese psych causative verbs fall into four broad categories.
sentences.chinese: 英汉使役心理动词按形态可分为四大类。

sentences.english: Mt Jiuhua Located in the south of Qingyang County, Anhui Province, the Jiuhua Moutain is one of China's four Buddhist shrines.
sentences.chinese: 九华山位于安徽省青阳县南，中国四大佛教名山之一。

sentences.english: Is the representative of shanxi opera, one of the big bang for Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 是山西省的代表性剧种，为山西省的四大梆子之一。

sentences.english: ConclusionHainan ecological environment is good, and is suitable for four south medicine large-scale plant.
sentences.chinese: 结论海南生态环境良好，适宜四大南药的大规模种植。

sentences.english: You know, Wang Zhaojun is one of "the four ancient beauties."
sentences.chinese: 王昭君是中国古代四大美女之一。

sentences.english: Spanish is an official language on four continents and is the mother tongue in 21 countries.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙语是四大洲21个国家的母语和官方语言。

sentences.english: Huaiyang is one of China's four major cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 淮杨菜可是中国四大菜系之一。
